settings.title: RETURNS
settings.text:
To adhere to San Francisco's Covid-19 Health Order, we've made some updates since 2020 to our process and policies. See how it applies to you here.

* * *

Items that are unworn and unused, with original packaging materials and tags attached, are returnable within 30 days (US Customers) and 45 days (International Customers) of original purchase date.

If approved, a refund in the original method of payment or store credit will be processed immediately. Original shipping charges are non-refundable. You will be notified if there are any issues with the return.
To submit a request, visit our return portals below:
If you requested a return before May 23, 2022, please email us at hello@kimandono.com for a status update.

settings.title: WHAT ITEMS ARE RETURNABLE?
settings.content:
• In original condition

• With original packaging, tags and accessories

• Within 30 days of original purchase

(See below for international returns)

settings.title: WHAT ITEMS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE?
settings.content:
• All sale items are Final and cannot be returned or exchanged

• Face Masks

• Gift supplies & gift wrap services

• Free gifts or promotional items

• Used, worn, soiled or altered items

Please visit FAQ for more details.

settings.title: HOW DO I INITIATE A RETURN?
settings.content:
• Access our Easy Return Portal with your order number and email address and follow on-screen instructions to initiate a return.

• Requests that require a review will be processed within 2 business days, and we will contact you for more details.

• Return shipping labels are provided for you, but should you decide to use your own shipping method, please choose options that offer tracking service.

• All returns must be received within 30 days of purchase date for US orders.

• If you requested a return before May 23, 2022, please email us at hello@kimandono.com for a status update.

settings.title: CAN I RETURN MY ONLINE ORDER AT THE STORE?
settings.content:
• You are welcome to drop off returns from an online purchase to our brick and mortar store in San Francisco. Please allow the standard 2 days to process all online returns.

• Our Easy Return Portal always offers convenient prepaid shipping labels so that you can simply drop off your return package at your local post office.

• If you need assistance beyond a simple drop-off, please contact us prior to stopping in to make the necessary arrangements. Our store associates cannot assist with an exchange or refund on the spot.

settings.title: HOW COME I CANNOT FIND MY ORDER?
settings.content:
• The portals linked above are for orders placed through this website only (order ID looks like "KO12345" or "GE12345678").

• If you ordered through our other shops, please visit their website to look up your order and request a return:

• Amazon

• Etsy

• Walmart

settings.title: MY ORDER ARRIVED WRONG OR DAMAGED. WHAT SHOULD I DO?
settings.content:
• You can submit a return ticket via our Return Portal (just like how you would request a return), select the appropriate reasons and provide details on what is missing or damaged

• Claims must be submitted within 2 business days of receipt of order to be valid

• Please note that many natural fibers and textiles include minor inconsistencies in texture and color that are in no way considered flaws

settings.title: ARE THERE ANY FEES FOR DOMESTIC (US) RETURNS?
settings.content:
• We now offer free exchanges!

• A free return shipping label will be provided for all returns

• A Restocking Fee of $10 applies for any orders returned for a refund

• Fee will be deducted from final refund

• Original shipping charges are non-refundable

• Returns may be rejected or charged extra restocking fee if received beyond 30 days

settings.title: HOW SOON WILL I GET MY REFUND?
settings.content:
• Returns are inspected and processed within 2 business days of our team receiving the return package

• Refunds are in the original method of payment, and it may take up to 7 days for the transaction to show up in your account depending on bank processing speed

• If questions arise during inspection, we will contact you for details

settings.title: WHAT IF I WANT AN EXCHANGE?
settings.content:
• You can now go through our Return Portal and request an exchange through there.

• Exchanges are free and you will receive a return label to ship the item back.

• If you choose to get the exchange right away, you can enter your credit card information (as a credit hold only) and no charges would be made if the return package is received within 14 days.

(See below for International orders.)

settings.title: I GOT AN EMAIL SAYING MY ORDER WAS UNDELIVERABLE. WHAT NOW?
settings.content:
• It means that the shipping carrier was unable to deliver the package to the address given in the order.

• When the carrier returns an undeliverable package to us, the order will be processed as a return and you will receive a refund (excluding shipping & handling charges).

• To prevent this, please ensure that your shipping information is correct during checkout and your order contains a valid email address in case we need to contact you.

• To receive the items you originally purchased, please place a new order.

settings.title: HOW DO I RETURN OR EXCHANGE A GIFT?
settings.content:
• Our Return Portal accepts gift returns or exchanges.

• You will need the order number or the sender's email address to look up the order in the portal.

• If you need help looking up the information, please email us and we can help you.

settings.title: HOW CAN I RETURN AN ORDER?
settings.content:
You can request a return at our International Return Portal

You will see two options in the portal:

1. Get return address label, ship package at local postal office & send us tracking number

2. Prepay postage to download a shipping label & drop off package at the postal office

settings.title: WHAT ITEMS ARE RETURNABLE?
settings.content:
• We accept any international returns within 45 days of original purchase

• Item must be in its original condition with original packaging, tags and accessories

• Used, worn, soiled or altered items will not be accepted

settings.title: WHAT HAPPENS AFTER I SUBMIT A REQUEST?
settings.content:
• As soon as the return package is received, we will inspect and process the order (see top of page for processing time)

• Original shipping is non-refundable

• Original duties & taxes are non-refundable because these are paid to customs authorities at the destination country upon delivery of the original order

• If you need a status update or have any questions, contact us here

settings.title: MY ORDER ARRIVED WRONG OR DAMAGED. WHAT SHOULD I DO?
settings.content:
• Within 2 business days of receipt, contact us on what is missing or damaged

• Claims must be submitted within 2 business days of receipt of order to be valid

• Please note that many natural fibers and textiles include minor inconsistencies in texture and color that are in no way considered flaws

settings.title: CAN I EXCHANGE MY ORDER?
settings.content:
• For fast processing, international exchanges are done in the form of a new order.

• You can return the original order via our International Return Portal & place a new order for the item you want.

• You can choose to either place the exchange order right away, or later when your refund is processed.

settings.title: HOW CAN I RETURN A GIFT?
settings.content:
• For international gift returns, please contact us for more details (check with gift sender for order ID & email address so that we can provide quick resolition)

• KIM+ONO store credit will be issued to you for the purchase amount of the item(s) instead of a refund to the original form of payment, so the sender will not know about your return.

• A gift receipt or proof of purchase must be presented for gift returns to be deemed valid. Please review our Return Policy above for more details.

settings.text: Have more questions about returns? Also review our FAQ.
